basics.name: Šimon Podhajský
basics.label: Data Everything
basics.summary: Data generalist quashing problems with data science and the modern data stack. Formerly a data scientist in a leading neuroscience/machine learning lab and a data lead at an insurtech startup.

work.name: Nano Energies DES
work.description: Flexibility aggregation to make renewable energy tractable
work.summary: Use data science and data engineering on the Development Analytics team to further the mission of grid flexibility aggregation.
highlights: Use mixed-integer programming to optimize the device distribution for regulation energy bids.
Develop a data quality assurance strategy for the company-wide data warehouse.

work.name: iLife Technologies
work.description: Secondary analytics for an insurtech startup
work.summary: Create an analytics platform for a B2B2C SaaS startup.
highlights: Lead a data team to provide operational analytics, quantitative insights, and business intelligence.
Design an event-tracking plan and an enterprise data warehouse to answer critical analytics questions.
Research, select, and deploy the data stack for business needs (Segment, dbt, Hex, Metabase, Hightouch).
Model the transformation of production data to a Kimball-style data warehouse using dbt/SQL.
Oversee an XGBoost implementation to model customer churn. Implement growth accounting.

work.name: SRI International / CNS Lab
work.summary: Use machine learning to understand the brain.
highlights: Design and implement an Airflow-based, Docker-using, Kubernetes-ready ETL system for processing incoming neuroimaging data. Architect and implement a Jupyter-based pipeline for porting twenty years' worth of data from a MS Access database to a longitudinal REDCap project.

Dispatch dataset generation, curation, and analysis requests supporting the lab's grant applications and underpinning 10+ published papers. Develop new or implement existing logic for feature extraction from raw behavioral data.

Debug, develop, and otherwise maintain Scalable Informatics for Biomedical Imaging Studies (SIBIS), a Python-based platform for uniform processing and data sharing of clinical neuroimaging datasets. Track any changes in Git and SVN and document functionality in a MediaWiki instance.

volunteer.summary: Educational association furthering the reasoning skills of high schoolers.
highlights: Coached the winning Team Czech Republic at the International Public Policy Forum 2012.

awards.title: CBIT-CORE Data Marathon Track 2015 Grand Prize
awards.summary: Develop a Shiny front-end for an ML algorithm predicting hospital readmission based on medical histories.

publications.name: Risk for depression tripled during the COVID-19 pandemic in emerging adults followed for the last 8 years
publications.summary: A mixed-effects analysis of the NCANDA cohort that revealed a sharp increase in depression risk during the pandemic.
